pages.name: People at the Trial
pages.description: These next questions will help identify who is expected to be participating in the trial.

elements.name: ApplicantName
elements.title: What is your full name?
elements.description: Copy your name from any filed court document.
elements.descFirstName: First Name is also known as Given Name
elements.descMiddleName: If you have more than one Middle Name, write them all in this box with spaces separating your Middle Names
elements.descLastName: Last Name is also known as Family Name or Surname

elements.name: Lawyer
elements.title: Will you have a lawyer representing you at the trial?

elements.name: LawyerName
elements.title: What is your lawyer's full name?

elements.name: otherPartyInfoTris
elements.title: What is the full name of the other party?
elements.description: Copy the name from the filed document.

elements.name: ExplanationServe
elements.title: You must serve each other party with a copy of the trial readiness statement at least 7 days before the date of the trial preparation conference or as ordered by the court.
